website_summaries.verdict: A bread that's as delicious on its own as it is as a sandwich.
pros: Udi's bread is packed with flavor
For longer-lasting bread: keep frozen and thaw slices in the toaster as needed
The bread smells appetizing and is full of protein and fiber
The mix of textures gives this bread a pleasant mouth feel
cons: Slices are on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Very good bread.  I DO NOT PLAN TO BUY IT AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: I can not buy a good Gluten Free loaf of bread locally and I usually keep bread in the freezer. Oops! In my haste to order bread, I failed to notice that this was a single loaf. I thought I was ordering two and even then, this was overpriced for two. I became suspicious when I had to sign for the bread at the door. I have never had anything stolen. I plan to eat the bread and enjoy it but unless I win the lottery, this will be a one time purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Bread
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fresh and tasty! I had to put some of it in the freezer because otherwise this brand will go bad most likely. I will try to find it in another store next time though because the price was a little high here. Other than that it was very good, yummy! I have a gluten issue and can't eat regular bread. I wish the company itself would put this bread in many more regular stores at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: AGmturker

customer_reviews.title: This product does not give me stomach problems !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Udi's products ! Especially their breads. They do not bother my stomach !!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Tyner

customer_reviews.title: Had to leave a review
customer_reviews.text: This is not bread its instantly turns into sand grainy consistency upon touching it and chewing it.

customer_reviews.title: It tastes and feels like wheat based sandwich bread
customer_reviews.text: It tastes and feels like wheat based sandwich bread. My daughter has a sever allergic reaction to gluten and this doesn't bother her at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Texture
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread because it has very good texture, not like some gluten free breads...Makes great toast...I eat it all the time...
customer_reviews.author: Diana Decker

customer_reviews.title: The closets thing to white bread I’ve found.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a white bread that toasts up beautifully for caviar snacks! Yayyyy!
customer_reviews.author: Foxworth

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, texture okay,  best I've found.
customer_reviews.text: This is the closest to tasting like regular bread that i could find. I am so happy to have something I can eat that resembles bread.
customer_reviews.author: rozeanjel

customer_reviews.title: This is so bad it's offensive
customer_reviews.text: This bread is terrible. It is the worst gluten free bread I have ever tried - and with the highest price tag. Udi's must think their customers are idiots. If you think this bread is good, your bar is too low. This bread isn't good enough for ducks. You can't even take it out of the bag without it falling apart, let alone spread peanut butter on it. It's not 2010 anymore, Udi's. Are you even trying? Have you done literally ANY market research?? I don't understand how Udi's is EVERYWHERE when they produce this garbage and brands that make awesome GF bread like La Brea are so hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: New "delicious" recipe has ruined Udi's bread.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy a couple loaves per week of Udi's original bread, but will be getting a different brand since the recipe change. "Delicious" doesn't describe this doughy, revolting bread substitute. Awful texture as is or toasted. What a disappointment--have liked Udi's bread for years.
customer_reviews.author: BeckJo

customer_reviews.title: The Best Thing Since Sliced Bread!
customer_reviews.text: I first had Udi's white sandwich bread at a restaurant. I spit it out because it was so good that I was sure they must have screwed up and given me regular bread. But they hadn't, and thus began my love affair with Udi's bread. My husband doesn't have celiac disease but he still loves this bread. The only reason he doesn't eat it all the time is because of the expense. The ends/heels of this bread can be hard so I grind them up in my food processor and freeze them for later use in recipes that call for bread crumbs. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: TRLK

customer_reviews.title: Are you KIDDING ME?! $18.00 for a LOAF OF BREAD?!
customer_reviews.text: Come on guys .. you aren't exactly the only brand on the market making gluten free breads. This is just appalling. Thanks for taking advantage of people who have no choice but to seek out products free of gluten. Udi's has been a favorite for me but this is such a massive turn off .... I am pissed. Do better Udi.
customer_reviews.author: Crazypretty

customer_reviews.title: It's Real Bread.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only gluten-free bread you'll ever need if you're looking for traditional "American" bread. It's not Wonderbread, but it's a better gluten-free cousin. This freezes and cooks wonderfully. (Think gluten-free French toast.) if you're looking for European bread (whole grain and hearty), I can't help you--but if you just want toast, this is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mims

customer_reviews.title: if it aint broke ??
customer_reviews.text: this bread use to be amazing , its terrible now. we already have so few options on things to eat I hate that this is now one more thing i cant/wont buy. I dont know what they did but they dropped the ball!
customer_reviews.author: Danigurl

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten-Free bread available
customer_reviews.text: I had this recommended to me by mutliple people as the best gluten-free bread since I had given up on find a decent gluten-free bread. Gluten is the heart of breads and pastas, so, doing without it, never gives exactly the same taste and texture. However, this is hands down the best gluten-free bread that I've eaten. It is good enough that my wife and kids actually love eating it. They say that, while it is a little different than regular bread, they very much like it. Still, we buy ours at Whole Foods for $5/12oz-loaf.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Miller

customer_reviews.title: Big holes!
customer_reviews.text: The last 3 times I have purchased Udi's white bread I have had bad experiences. In each case I've found large holes in over 1/2 the very expensive loaf. 1 was golf ball sized and the other was. More tennis ball sized. I have been very disappointed to only use partial loaves. I will try other vendors now.
customer_reviews.author: Irelandserin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tasted like bread (though I toasted and added butter); so I was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chantay

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this bread!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this bread - TWICE! - because the first loaf I bought seemed stale and tasteless. Thinking that maybe I had bought a "bad" loaf or something, threw it away and bought another. SAME THING!! It was horrible! This time, I took the bread back to the store and asked for my money back. The salesgirl said that a lot of people don't like this, but there's not much else to choose from when it comes to buying gluten-free bread that does taste good. Great, huh?
customer_reviews.author: oberz3

customer_reviews.title: Seriously good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best store-bought gluten free bread I've ever tasted. Granted I haven't tried all the different kinds, but enough to know that Udi's makes FANTASTIC gf bread. It's light, crusty, and tastes like bread. It toasts up beautifully. I can't get enough.
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: Tried most of the gluten-free breads out there, this is one of the better ones - no funky flavor and has the texture of real bread when toasted. Only one I've found that is better is Canyon Bakehouse, which is not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: don't buy it here
customer_reviews.text: Udi's bread products are delicious but do not buy them here! Get them at your local health food store for half the price and no shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: alina postula

product_meta.title: Udi's Gluten Free Delicious Soft White Sandwich Bread, Mini Slices, Sliced 12 Ounce Loaf
product_meta.description: Eat well, smile often. Our mission is to show you a new way to approach gluten-free living. Don't waste another bite on bland, crumbly and tasteless food. Udi's makes delicious products that will fill your stomach and warm your soul.
feature_bullets: FRESH FROM THE BAKERY FLAVOR Our gluten free breads provide incredible fresh from the bakery flavor at home.
THE PERFECT TEXTURE The soft and scrumptious texture is ideal for hearty sandwiches or tasty toast.
FULL OF TASTE, FREE OF GLUTEN - Whether you prefer breads, pizza, pastas, snacks, or another favorite, we have the perfect flavorful, gluten-free solution for you.

ENJOY BREAD AGAIN Even on a gluten-restricted diet, Udi's Gluten Free makes your favorite foods an option again. A variety of baked goods, meals and snack options ensure there is something to fit everyone's taste.

UDI'S MISSION – Our mission is to provide you with the best gluten free food on the planet. Udi’s is committed to making delicious food that just happens to be gluten free, because we believe you shouldn’t have to compromise on taste to live a gluten free lifestyle.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
